name: Botology
description: A company is currently in development of robots for the new generation - Botology, conduct tests for a new system for the remote control of robots. The purpose of the company is to help future potential buyers explore the remote space systems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core, 2.5 Ghz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: any with DX11 support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Game does not support DirectX below 11 version. That means it won't work on Windows XP or Windows Vista
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core, 3 Ghz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: The level design is quite alright and the story is partly reasonable. If you die on a mission you don't have to repeat tasks again. So much for the pro side. On the bad side: The aiming is a nightmare because, the crosshair isn't aligned with the center of the screen and your weapon. Voice acting... how shall I put it? It's late 20th century text to speech. Do yourself a favor and turn it off. The inventory is an untidy chaos, using it is suicide while in hostile areas. Some of the achievements don't work. Rating 3/ 10 Cards: six
This must be removed off planet Earth! Seriously!  Gameplay -10/10 Graphics -10/10 Audio -10/10 Story: I don't think it even has one!  STEAM must enable 'DELETE FROM LIBRARY' option ASAP!!!
